import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Tag By Key"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/content/tags/{key}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get a tag by given `key`.

You can find more information about tags [here](../../docs/guides/content/tags).

### Locale
Tags can have multiple translations for `name` and `description`.
You can specify a `locale` to generate the corresponding translation.

If no locale is specified, the applications default locale will be used.
You can learn more about configuring the default locale [here](../../docs/guides/configuration).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"key","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"locale","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The tag with `key`.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"key":{"type":"string"},"locale":{"type":"string"},"name":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"}},"required":["description","key","locale","name"],"title":"TagResponse"}}}},"404":{"description":"The following error codes correspond to this status:\n* **`DATABASE_ENTITY_NOT_FOUND`:** Exception representing a failure to find a database entity.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"code":{"type":"string"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["code","error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"500":{"description":"The following error codes correspond to this status:\n* **`DATABASE_FAILURE`:** Exception representing a general failure related to database operations.\n* **`NO_TRANSLATIONS`:** Exception indicating that no translations are available for a given request.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"code":{"type":"string"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["code","error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
